name: PODOPHYLLOTOXIN
cautions:
Cautions avoid normal skin and open
wounds; keep away from face; very irritant to eyes
doses:
condylomata acuminata affecting the penis or the female
external genitalia, apply twice daily for 3 consecutive days; treatment
may be repeated at weekly intervals if necessary for a total of five
3-day treatment courses; direct medical supervision for
lesions in the female and for lesions greater than 4 cm2 in the male; max. 50 single applications
(‘loops’) per session (consult product literature); child 2–18 years see BNF for Children
